text: Update : Still great! Delivery people are still friendly, on time, and know what they are doing. One mistake ( forgot drinks ) was made good on the next order without a problem. So far they have never let me down.
Food was delicious and reasonably priced, excellent customer service. Bonus, the owner is an incredibly genuine guy! Would recommend to anyone wanting pizza or sandwiches!

I have ordered albos 3 times while visiting Las Vegas. The food is affordable and tasty. That said the people on the phone don't seem to understand what people expect out of a cashier at a delivery place. The person seemed more interested in making me laugh than making sure my order was right and they could deliver it. This time my delivery driver was kicked out of my hotel and I had to come to the entrance to get my food. If I wanted to walk through my hotel I wouldn't have ordered delivery, I would have gotten food from the food court.

The previous time I ordered they had no problem getting into our room but we discovered on the receipt had my ENTIRE CREDIT CARD NUMBER, EXPIRATION DATE, CC2 CODE, AND ZIP WRITTEN ON THE RECEIPT. The driver kept a copy. This is completely unacceptable as it invites identity theft.

The person answering the phone also seems very distracted and set the phone down twice (for 5 min or so each time) to take an order from a customer in the store rather than taking the minute or two to finish our transaction or placing me on hold to deal with the in store customer.

In short fast, cheap, food with a very poor execution.

From the eastcoast so when i relocated to vegas,i had a hard time adjusting to how they made pizza out here. Then one day while walking from downtown..i decided to try albos since it smelled good and there were lots of people in the restaurant. The pizza is the best ive tried in vegas thus far!..you can tell the ingredients are fresh and they dont skimp on their products. The cashier and the cook are always nice when i come in. The carry out special is the best and i always get a wings on the side.(they are sooo good)..i am a sauce person so when i tried the bluecheese,it was fresh and not watery. This is my fav pizzeria

I've ordered the double cheesesteak add jalapeños and onions a bunch of times.  I've picked it up and gotten as delivery.  I used to live up the street but now I use door dash for delivery.  Every-time it's meaty cheesy perfection in a tender fresh roll.  Delicious!!   I've also had the hot wings.  Good crispy hot wings.  The pizza is good as well.  Toppings stacked high.  Crust could be a bit thinner/crispier but, with all that cheese it's still very delicious.  For the price, quality, and flavor on sandwiches, pizza, or wings, you cannot beat it.  If you're picking up, stop by Dino's next door and get some drinks.

Best delivery pizza hands down!  Although my husband spent less than 2 seconds with the delivery guy, the hand off was fast and furious but the end result was superb! We haven't step foot in the eatery, just received a flier on our door...pretty tasty; and we're picky!

Love, love, love Albo's!!!

5 stars is not enough.

I am at home recovering from surgery in a hospital bed and not able to get around very well on my own.

My room mate works odd hours right now and after finding Albo's they have been a life saver.

Thanks to Nick and the other driver that don't mind coming in and dropping my order off I get to eat a nice hot meal on those nights.

Food has always been delicious and so hot and fresh.

Love the hot chicken wings. They are flavorful but not real hot.

The double Philly cheese steak. So yummy!

Also love the Chicken Parasean with wide noodles and the sub is really good to.

They also have those great wide steak fries.

And you have to try the ranch dressing. Is so good on everything and it is handmade on site.

The only bad thing I have had from there was a chef salad and that was only because the lettuce was old and turning brown. The toppings were tasty and plentiful on it though.

I still have to try the pizza. Maybe tonight!

Be sure to check them out they are one of the cheapest amnd best places around.

We've  been  there twice. First time we found it by accident  after hanging out next door at dino's and their service  was great even late at night. Pizza and wings were delicious  and way cheaper  than  food in socal. Second  time took the family  and again, the food was great. Huge pizza slices with a nice crisp crust. We've  just found our new favorite  place to eat in Vegas without  breaking  the  bank.

Pleasantly surprised there pizza was very good it reminded me of ny pizza the wings were good too I did notice the girl had an accent I asked where they was from she said Bulgaria. Damn keep it up good pizza worth a try when you go to Vegas

This pizza is my favorite one in the whole of Las Vegas area. I don't know what it is, but I'm so addicted to their pizza. Maybe they add some secret ingredient to it? ;)  Anyway, highly recommend this place to anyone. You won't regret.

I ordered a delivery. They let me order the Chicken Fetticine Alfredo but after I ordered it and paid for it already they cancelled it on me saying they np longer have sauce. Also the chicken wings I ordered were plain when I ordered them with medium sauce and also tasted old and spoiled like it was bad meat. It was disgusting. I ate 2 and threw the rest away. They wouldn't refund me for them either. Just an overall terrible experience which is sad because they have been good in the past.
Average at best. When our pizza arrived, it wasn't very hot. Antipasto salad was just so-so.

Awesome awesome will definitely go back 
Best pizza best chicken strips 
Must check this place out
Service is fast and friendly. White pizza and tuna salad best of the best .love it that place I'm recommended Albo pizza 100%

What a hidden Gem!!
The pizza & wings were fresh & hot upon delivery which arrived @ our front door 15 min Earlier than the original ETA
The salad was crispy & cold and the desserts -
I have thrown out the menus to the place we use to order from....ALBO's checks all the boxes: Quality Price  Service!!!

Great tasting pizza and EXTREMELY  reasonable prices and delivery charge.  To top it off the delivery person was very friendly and was on time. Great experience! Wish we had one back home in San Antonio.

Delicious burgers and pizzas made with perfectly prepared crusts, that have been carefully topped with the best ingredients. Bravo!! Albo Pizza, I will continue to be a very frequent and loyal customer.
We ordered online. It said 45-60 minutes but we got our food delivered in 20 minutes :) Their calzones are huge and taste great! Highly recommended!

The bacon cheeseburger, and fries I had last night were really good.  The delivery is super fast and the food was sufficiently warm.   The girl who took my order was very friendly.

The only reason I didn't give five stars is because I order and make 1/2 burgers all the time and this one was closer to a third pound and was cooked well instead of medium.  I will absolutely order from them again, and get the one pound and stress to please cook medium.  :)

Amazing pizza. We ordered the white pizza and we were able to customize it.  Got half with spinach and mushroom and the other half veggie.   Came out really good.  Got the penne vegetarian as well.  Was a little too tangy and overloaded with olives.  May not order pasta again if I revisit.  
Very welcoming and attentive staff. Will  go back.

The food was fantastic the service was great we ordered to go and they delivered and even waited 20 minutes for us to get down to the lobby i was thoroughly pleases and the price is not bad highly recommend to anyone!

I love Albo's Pizza their Double Philly Cheese Steaks, are the BEST cheese steak subs I have had in Las Vegas and I have lived here 7yrs and it took me this long to find the perfect cheese steak to MY Boston/NY taste. Now I have my neighbors ordering them too from the Seigel Suites so it's close to home, fast delivery; food is still hot when we get it and it's all we ever order LOL. Always 2 to 4 Cheese Steaks because they are so good.

We also did a taste test contest  with Albo's  Philly cheese steak -vs-Boston Pizza cheese steak across the street from  ALBO's and Albo's WON hands down! With the freshest bread daily and the quality of meat is outstanding with the right amount of cheese. (Boston pizza meat was too salty and didn't have the same presentation that Albo's given you and the bread sucked up all the cheese and just not as good as Albo's my ALL time favorite, I will never go anywhere but Albo's for them.

They are so good, I even put a pic on my Facebook cause their that good, staff is very friendly and we have dined in twice which is very charming atmosphere. I even took my Boss there for lunch he's very picky BUT he even loved the Cheese Steaks He said "they were the best he ever had" and he's eat worldwide and loved them.
Wow me and my hubby just tried the philly cheese steak and Icant believe all this time ive never order it ...ITS A MUST TRY

**** UPDATE ***

After writing the review below Eat24 contacted me by email to address the pricing issue. They had done the menu incorrectly and I was inadvertently overcharged for extra toppings. They sent me. $2 coupon. That really wasn't my issue. I just wanted the pizza I ordered. 

Around lunch time the day after the interaction described below, the same driver arrived unannounced with the pizza I had ordered the day before. He apologized and said he wanted to make it right. He also refunded the $6 I didn't even know I had been overcharged. 

It's not how you fall it's how you get up so I'm adding a couple stars to my previous review because of the impressive effort to correct the situation. 

***********


Ordered pizza online. Half pepperoni and half pepperoni, sausage, pineapple, and artichoke ... Each extra topping cost $2.00 and the bill shows I paid for all the toppings. Pizza arrived without the pineapple and artichoke. 

Driver arrived and I was with a customer. I acknowledged him and let him know I would be with him in a minute. Literally two minutes later he exited the office and started into the employee area ... Not cool. He let me know he was in a hurry. I get that. His total wait was less than 4 minutes ... But at least he got all the money ... I didn't get all the toppings!!

This is my favorite pizza place in Las Vegas. The crust is very good. I like the french fries as well. I had a problem once with a delivery. But the next day the manager was very helpful in making sure I was happy. I would definitely recommend this place if you are in Las Vegas. They deliver the most hotels I think. The prices are also great.

I tried ordering from Albo's pizza at 11:44 p.m.

They are supposed to stay open until 12...

I guess what they really meant was we close whenever we feel like it.

Thanks for calling me 13 minutes later to let me know...
Great Food, Reasonable Prices, Friendly Service. Highly Recommend. Pizza, Subs, Salads, Wings, Jalapeno Poppers, Philly Cheesesteaks, all delicious!!!

Everything was delicious! Ordered chicken fingers and a side salad. Everything was hot and tasted cooked! The ranch was a special mix they did and was tasty! 10/10 would recommend if you're looking for a great pizza place and is also cheap!

Best cheese fries I've ever had hands down! Servings are worth the price too 
Was really suprised with how good this place was :)

Delivery was super fast!!!! Wish the the tuna salad had some celery or relish mixed in. It appears to be just tuna & mayo. Veggies in salad looks/tastes fresh. Mozzarella sticks & marinara were very good. Will order again from this place.
Amazing Pizza and Gyro!!! We got half buffalo and half Albo without onions or green peppers. So cheesy, definitely didn't skimp on the ingredients. Order take out or delivery and great service!

The food is always good and hot and the customer service is great. I order regularly and this is my go to pizza spot. The gyros are pretty tasty too. I had an issue making it home before my pizza made it to the house and the driver was so sweet to wait for 10 min for me to get there. So not only are they fast, they care about their customers.

So happy! We just moved into the Huntridge neighborhood and I was worried that we would be limited to Pizza Hut or using a service like Postmates when we ordered pizza but this place is good!! Super happy to have found my new pizza delivery spot.

Fantastic place! Ordered the 2-cheese pizza's special my first time around and it was delicious!
2nd time, I ventured towards the cheeseburger, Italian sub and antipasto salad...delivery was under 25 minutes. Incredible food, prices and service make Albo's one of the best in Vegas.

Pizza was very delicious even though I didn't get exactly what I ordered. I also ordered baked ziti but was disappointed when it arrived because on Postmates it didn't state it had meat in it. Despite that it 
was still really good.

happy I ordered from them, reasonable prices, fast delivery, I asked for extra ketchup, I got it. I asked for my food well done, I got it. The sauce for the mushrooms came in a generous size container, thank you, burger was the best part, I'm super picky on pizza, so, I'm rarely impressed in this category, I will say the next order, gonna try the lasagne, I think I read somewhere it's homemade, yummy, I like this place, the entire dinner was awesome, and can't wait to order it again ;))) hope this helps, cya

Wow....the pizza was absolutely amazing....and the pasta was crazy good!  The "special" sauce was truly special.

And I really really liked the homemade garlic bread!

It was very laid back, and the service was superb.  The prices were great for the amount of food we received!

I can still taste the yummy pizza....can't wait to go back and have the pizza and pasta again :-)

A little late review, but better late than never. Think I were there at 8-9 pm july 3 if I don't remember completely wrong, ordered spaghetti with meatballs. Big portion, got really full. Nice and kind staff.
Might be my new Togo spot.. Very good Cheesesteak add jalapenos. The lasagna was super cheesy and deliciously hot still. The lunch specials are great deal

It's the only Pizza Place we eat when I take my family and friends out. Great prices, relaxing atmosphere. When you do go, get the Meat Express. It comes with (((   ))) The taste is better than the words!
Had Pizza, spaghetti, and lasagna here. All pretty good. Service was great. What made it even better was the price! Got a family special and fed 6 people for $32

Situé au nord du Strip, Albo Pizza ne paie vraiment pas de mine vu de l'extérieur. Conseillé par le staff du Cat Hostel où j'ai séjourné 1 nuit avant de prendre mon vol pour New York le lendemain, je rentre dans l'établissement qui est vide à 21h. Normal les américains mangent tôt.
Accueil souriant par la serveuse qui nous tend des menus typiques américains.
J'ai commandé le burger classique avec frites et mon amie les spaghettis et boulettes de viande.
Après à peine 10 minutes d'attente viennent les plats. 
Le burger est particulièrement savoureux et les frites dorées à point!
Les quantités sont quant à elles énormes et le prix imbattable, comptez 12$ pour un plat et une boisson.
En résumé Albo Pizza est une très bonne option si vous cherchez un resto passé 21h dans cette section assez désertée du strip.
Merci au staff du Cat Hostel!
Love this place. Deliveries to my work every time and has a great lunch menu and good prices.

I dare anybody to find a better pizza in Las Vegas!!! And their sandwiches, salads, burgers and pastas are the bomb too.  The owner and staff are always super friendly.  Everything I've had here is delicious and the prices are really great.  These guys know what they're doing, no doubt about it.
Amazing Philly cheese steak!!!!! Had it 2 times and would have had more had we stayed longer! Best around!!!!

Tried this place a couple of months ago for "Pizza and a Movie" night at home. Delivery was prompt and the Mr. Food Pizza (love that name) we selected was tasty and satisfying, with plenty of toppings. See the pic I posted. 

Negatives were the doughy crust and the fact that it arrived luke warm.  Driver did not have an insulation pack for the product, which we thought was odd.  Isn't that taught in Pizza Delivery 101?

Still haven't found a pizza in town better than Metro, but my quest endures.

Albo Pizza is not the worst in town by any means, but it lands in the middle of the pack.

Just received a email from yelp where they took the picture down of the roaches on the walls and floor of their restaurant. I find it a little discouraging that I never received a reply or apology from the owners of this restaurant yet yelp found it necessary to take pictures down because it isn't a broad representation of the business. Hhmm I wonder how much that cost you aldo pizza? Don't worry I won't step into a place where they're are roaches crawling everywhere and I don't get a simple reply of concern from the owners!

Unfortunately, our experience with Albo Pizza was terrible. We were hungry and wanted to try a nice Pizza shop outside of the hotel we're staying in. Checked Albo Pizza and saw 4 stars so we went with it. Placed our order for Pizza and wings...
1. The cheese on the pizza wasn't fully melted. 2. The garlic wings were old and very dry. Barely any sauce. What made things worse was the fact that the soda was flat. Completely flat, no fizz at all. Didn't eat the Pizza, didn't drink the soda. Total waste of $$ money!
Albo's had quality food, open long hours a low delivery minimum, and a low delivery rate.

I heard such great things about this place ordered a large pizza and wings soda it was okay your average I do not think there's enough sauce on the pizza and the flavor wasn't over-stimulating so I probably will not order again but not the worst pizza I've ever had

Awesome place! I love their pizza with the white sauce. Great atmosphere and prices are outstanding. Customers service is always excellent. I recommend to order food to delivery and dine in. You will not be disappointed.

We stopped by this pizza place because of their yelp reviews and proximity to the stratosphere and I must say, they did not disappoint! 

It was three of us (all males) starving after a long night of raging at EDC and we needed tons of food to recover. We ordered one or their family deals which was quite the bang for the buck. 

18" cheese pizza w/ one topping, 20 wings two sauce flavors, 8 huge chicken fingers, and 2 liter coke to wash it down. 

All of this under $40. 

To top it off, the food was delicious. 
The place was empty when we showed up so we were greeted right away. The food took about 20 minutes to arrive at our table after we ordered. 

They were nice enough to add an extra layer of cheese on top of our pepperoni because it was our first time there. Kudos for that. 

All in all this is our new pizza spot in Vegas, the prices are great, the food is delicious and the service was great as well!

This place has been shut down twice . The pizza was mediocre at best but the real problem is the seafood being undercooked and contaminated. My boyfriend and I live downtown and he warned me... I should of listened!

We wanted to marathon the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles movies and knew we'd be craving pizza before long, so we opted to order in and went with these guys. We got large pizza with pepperoni and mushrooms plus extra cheese and it was great! Good chewy crust with a crisp exterior and big air pockets from the yeast. Definitely a nice change of pace from that hot n' ready stuff. The chicken tenders were large and crispy with meat that pulled apart easily by hand. The Bleu cheese dressing was flavorful and chunky. We got a Greek salad as well, which was nice and big and loaded with toppings but we're saving it for later. Two slices of pizza and two chicken fingers were plenty of food! Delivery was reasonably priced and took a normal amount of time to arrive. No issues with the driver finding us and the food was all packed well for travel. Overall quite happy to have found a neighborhood delivery spot we like
I had the Albo's Special and Philly cheesesteak, both were delicious. Good food for a good price.

Found this place and thanks to yelp saw that it was near home, so after reading the reviews and having huge pasta cravings decided to give it a try and wasn't disappointed at all. 

Got there ask for take out: pasta with meat balls and garlic bread, cashier let us know that it would be 20 min for our order to be ready so we decided to just wait, it was worth it, I really liked everything it was the right amount, perfect for my husband and I to share. (Husband added cheese at home which I was also craving lol) 


I would recommend this place!

The grinders are what I always go for, but nothing beats their pie after a long night of drinking and karaoke at Dino's next door! I have had the Philly, and it does not disappoint. Today I went for the eggplant parmesan, and it is amazing! The bread is fresh and delicious, the sauce is great, and it's buried in cheese. Perfection! Fiancee always gets the party melt and would probably eat one every day if allowed to.

This place was absolutely awful. 

We stayed at a hotel 1.5 miles away (after looking at a map), but wound up being charged a "$5 delivery fee" made up on the spot by the people in the background when I placed our order. We didn't fight it as we'd been traveling all day long and were starving. 

We ordered a Chicken and Broccoli 14 inch pizza and a White Pizza of the same size and an order of cheeseless (it matters when you're ordering) Garlic Bread. Our total came to $39.40 (before tip). The delivery guy called me when he got to the hotel, but hung up on me when he saw my husband waiting. It was rude.

Anyways, the food itself was awful. The dough was okay, but the toppings sucked. The chicken on mine tasted like it came out of a can or bag--definitely NOT grilled as they indicated on their menu. The broccoli was frozen, not like I expected anything exceptionally fresh, but c'mon.. My husband's pizza wasn't good either and he barely ate two slices before dumping it. The garlic bread was a joke and not worth what they charged for it.

I imagine this place being good if you have no taste buds or are pickled drunk, but for normal people it's a no-go.

I placed a delivery order while in town for a conference. The pizza was delicious! Hot wings were also good. I would place an order again when visiting.
Service time was only 30 minutes.

Great pizza and portion size! Was backpacking around Vegas and it was just next to Tod Hostel and Motel(where I stayed).

Took out a large pizza for a very good price(probably 26 dollars for an 18inch pizza. Great stuff!

Friendly waitress who greeted us.

10/10 in terms of economic value and portion. Will highly recommend it!

I get food from here often. Everything I've had so far is great. Chicken fingers, cheese steak, pizza, chicken wings all yummy.. The ranch is awesome. Delivery is always super fast and some of the nicest drivers ever. I love this place.

Okay, so my wife and I were trapped in Downtown Vegas by the Las Vegas Marathon.  We wandered around until we got hungry, then stopped into Albo for a pizza.  I asked the charming Bulgarian woman at the cash register if they could make a pizza very, VERY thin -- "New York style."  She said their pizza wasn't that thin, but they would try.

10 minutes later, a guy proudly brought the pizza to the table and said "this is the thinnest pizza we have ever made."  And, to paraphrase the Talking Heads, "it was."

The pizza's crust was nearly paper thin, the sauce was tasty but not over-seasoned, the cheese was fresh and the sausage was moist and flavorfulywithout being greasy.

My wife and I are happily married, in large part because we have the same taste:  in home decor, in comedy...in PIZZA.  My wife lived 10 years in NYC and, the morning after our Albo experience, she expressed her confusion over the fact that she thinks the pizza we had by accident in a crummy part of Vegas was one of the 3 best pizzas she's ever eaten.

So, if you get a chance (or even have to manufacture an excuse), go to Albo and tell them to make it "...very, VERY thin."  You won't be sorry!
Our go to for delivery! Love the food and the service is fantastic! Just placed an order for dinner tonight....can't wait!

Ordered delivery last night and they were 20 min. early! Woo! The pizza was pretty good but the wings were too dry and needed WAAAYY more sauce! 

We ordered the Garlic wings and the Mr Food Pizza. The delivery fee was only $1.50 and everything else was pretty cheap, too. I'll definitely order delivery for a pizza from them again!

I dont normally do reviews but I feel like I got robbed, I got charged for things I didn't receive and when I called back they laughed and said they dont know what to do because the manager isn't there not to mention the food fell short of just ok wings greasy with very little sauce and pizza burnt and taste like a cracker I'm never eating here again
Went to Vegas with my wife for my birthday. Found this place while walking to the downtown Las Vegas. Great pizza, awesome stuff! We'll be back when I get a chance.
Just ordered a Philly cheesesteak for my wife and she said it's the best cheesesteak she's had here in las vegas since we moved from Philly.  Burger was ok but I don't think it was a half pound.

Our last night in Vegas and we wanted to stay in, enjoy some movies and get good delivery. We decided on Albo Pizza due to the reviews and for the most part it was great!

Delivery was excellent and came in half the estimated time! So Awesome! 

We ordered Spaghetti w/ Meatballs and side salad; Lasagna w/ side salad; BBQ Chicken Wings and soda.

The sauce was delicious, the meatballs were so good and the noodles were perfectly cooked! 

The lasagna was burned and tough to eat and the wings were pretty crispy. The side salads had great toppings, but the lettuce was just chopped iceberg, for $1.50 though...I can't complain.

Horrible service and rotten food! Pizza we had ordered had made our entire staff sick. And the driver had taken forever, like an hour and a half late.

DON'T EVER ORDER HERE!

They have the best cheese fries ever. Very friendly staff. The delivery guys are always so sweet and usually arrive a few min earlier than expected. Food is always fresh and warm. If you're considering ordering from here, do it. You won't be disappointed.

Called for take out, didn't feel like doing a pizza chain. I had the spaghetti with meatballs and a salad. My wife had the Caesar Salad. We were both happy with the food an delivery was only a half hour, but it was pretty early in a Monday evening. The food was good enough I would give them another try.

What a great find! I've always seen this place when I'm biking in the area but didn't think of trying them till I needed pizza in a pinch and found a menu they left in my door. I got a good take out special and was very satisfied with the service, price, and the taste! I wouldn't go so far as to say that this is on par with what you'd find in NYC but it's definitely a step or two above other take out places like Dominos, Little Caesars or Papa John's. (but then again those places are take out only and this has a restaurant so I guess I'm really not comparing apples with apples) I'll still eat at those other places occasionally but I like to support small, local places if I can. I'll definitely come back and I might even try dining in!

Albo's has good food and good people. Their delivery drivers are prompt and polite. Foods good too. I've had the bbq chicken pizza (great with a side of bleu cheese), the baked ziti (fantastic) and a few other pizzas as well. Would definitely recommend.

I ALWAYS come here when I'm in the area . ( not the best area) . Everyone I do bring here always asks to return . They excel in friendly service , and their chicken hot wings are the best ! Better than Wingstop or Buffalo Wild Wings . (In my opinion) 
They also serve pasta dishes (baked ziti at $9.49 was huge ) 
12 wings will run $7.99
Fries $1.99
They have burgers , sandwiches, salads, soups and limited seafood.  Also pizza , sadly not my favorite of their offerings , but very affordable including the 14 inch pick up only price of 6.95 
Or dine  in family specials such as 10 inch pizza with one topping , 10 wings , fries and soda for 15.99
They have lunch specials such as meatball sub fries and soda $6.99
Dining area itself is large with tables and booths ( a little worn down but clean)  they have bathrooms and pictures of old vegas on the walls . Parking is VERY limited. Only a few spaces available . A lot of people park and walk . 
Like I said not my FAVORITE pizza , but EVERYTHING ELSE on the menu is the best !  Do not leave without trying the chicken wings .

So I am a Philadelphia native so I am a big fan of little hole in wall places.

My girl had me go here on a Friday night, as she wanted wings.

I walked into a place which brought me back home right away.
My coworkers and I always order from this place, always professional and on time! Very good customer service and food!

It pains me to have to do this, but this was the worst veggie pizza and cheesy fries I've ever eaten. The pizza was on the soggy side and the fries were comparable to a bag you'd buy from Walmart and put in the oven. Wait, that might have been a better option than what I received. Somehow the cheesy fries were warmer than the pizza, which was cold. After sampling both I knew there was no way I'd be eating the leftovers so I walked out of my apartment and gave the rest to a homeless man. I felt guilty doing that. He deserves good pizza, too.
Order from this place a couple times a week. Best pizza and best wings in town. Hands down. Delivery is fast and friendly.

One of the best meatball parm sandwiches in Vegas. Bread has great crunch and texture, the sauce was decent with good flavor. The meatballs we moist and had some character, and the entire sandwich was very well executed and at a good price for lunch.
Although my order selection was quite bland the pie and chicken were great. Good value for dollar
Good Pizza, good service, the fried mozzarella sticks could use some help though. Maybe just a little bit longer in the fryer. But over all good job!

It was a great place off the strip to go and have a chill lunch. We were two of maybe 6 people we saw the whole hour we were there. Food was tasty. Crust was hand made. We got to watch a movie while we were there. Great customer service. Super nice.
This place is amazing. I've traveled a lot and this is by far my favorite pizza joint.

If you're looking for delicious hamburgers and fries, look elsewhere. I ordered a Western burger with fries and both were mediocre. The bread was so hard and crispy and the sesame seeds on the bun were brown (the hell). The onion rings (if that's what you want to call them) had no flavor and the pickles had no place being on the burger. The only thing I enjoyed was the water. Save your money and go elsewhere.

used to go there all the time till I seen them on dirty dining(google KVNV dirty dining) and you will see, and what is worse my family and I ate there the day the pics were taking, never eat there again.

Ordered around 9;30pm. Arrived in 45 mins on a Wednesday, just like they said. Affordable 18" thin pizza for $18+ change. We ordered the vegetarian and we weren't dissatisfied. Lots of cheese and well portioned ingredients. Not the best pizza I've had, but they deliver downtown and were open :) 3.5 stars, if halves were allowed on here.

We order delivery from here weekly and always get their New York Style Cheese Pizza with Pepperoni. It's so delicious & fresh out of the oven every time! It's how I imagined TMNT pizza would taste lol! Goofy, but true... and I'm sure my kids would agree with me. There have been a few mishaps along the way, such as the time the delivery driver forgot the pizza (which was hilarious) but they've always resolved situations quickly and efficiently.

Shocked! Shocked, I tell you!

The pizza at Albo's is really good! Very cheesy. They do not skimp on the mozzerella that's for sure.

One night, I picked up a pizza from my old stand-by, Napoli, on Decatur, and one from Albo's....to see which one was better.

Albo's was better, by an angel-hair. Frankly, I think that Napoli was having a bad night; probably breaking in a new chef.

Albo's has pick-up specials: 18 inch, and 14 inch. They should have a 16 inch special, but for some reason they don't. 
(Guys; piece of advice: put a 16 inch pick-up special on your menu....immediately!!!)

Here's the cosmic amusement of it all: Napoli is run by Russians.
And so is Albo's.

Having recently had a number of very mediocre pizzas while I was working in Italy, I'm wondering: Have the Russians figured out how to make better pizza than the Italians?

This food is amazing. I ordered a huge pizza with tons of toppings and cheese and they were able to make it perfect. The California pizza was way way better than we expected. I'll order here more for sure.

So after a year of delivery from here, still the same results awesome dbl cheese stk modifications plentiful , great lunch deals, good and big calzones for less than 10$.. The pizzas are good no doubt ... Almost always within 45min, but im down the road .. So its easy.. Just saying for a year its been my go to delivery for this kinda food. Good deal for Vegas imo

Good pizza for the money! Drive from Westgate took minutes and was quicker than delivery!  The only reason for 4 star was the pizza could have been cooks a little longer... I prefer thin crust to be crispy or at least more crisply than soft.

I dunno, seemed like a pretty stingy pizza, ordered a large pepperoni pizza and a sprite $20, when the pizza arrived an hour later(we're 7 minutes away) The kids asked where the pepperoni was? I guess that's what I get for trying to save a couple bucks, I'll stick with Boston Pizza next time.
I have not been let down.  Good food, great sauces, speedy delivery to my room.  Good people.  Keep it up!
The pizza is amazing!! I highly recommend that place! I eat from Albo's almost every day and I'm waiting no longer than 20-25 minutes for delivering to my house, which is great!

Ordered from Albo's for a team lunch. I personally ordered the turkey club with fries, just average to me. My team members got the meat calzone and that was better than average. I'd say overall it's a basic pizza/bar food restaurant. Beats ordering from a pizza chain. I wouldn't go out of my neighborhood to come here but it was decent for a working lunch.

This was the first place I ever grub-hubbed when I moved here and I keep coming back. Pizzas are cooked perfect, calzones are super tasty, and they are really good about customizing your order. Will definitely keep ordering from these guys.

Located in the shadow of the Stratosphere this place has good ol Vegas-style pizza-Cheap & Fast!

!We ordered the FAMILY DINNER special w/1-2topping 18"pizza,spaghetti,lasagna,salad and garlic bread plus a @L of Coke=$30!! Delivered in 30 minutes.

Pizza was good,lasagna too but spaghetti was nothing specialsalad was warm from being delivered in the same bag & the garlic bread wasnt toasted.

Still a good value & pizza for breakfast the next day!!!

Tried this place based on the positive reviews. . .  I visit Vegas about five times a year. It is just north of the Stratosphere in a pretty seedy area. Inside, we entered and were the only ones in the place which we thought was a bad sign. As far as atmosphere goes it is pretty basic -- ugly red paint and bleak. There is a single TV and a small very basic bar.

I had a pizza and wife had pasta -- the pizza was really good. I almost finished a 10 inch by myself. The crust was perfect and the toppings were fresh and yummy. The pasta was just okay. . .  the pizza was definitely a winner and I would get it for takeout in the future.

The price was super. . .  about 22 bucks total. They serve no alcohol at all so no cold draft beer to go with your pizza. I mean, the place was a hole but the pizza was really good and the price was right. I think most of the previous posts are just plants by the owner.

Bottom line - a hole but solid cheap pizza.

I asked for extra marinara and didn't get it. My food was cold which made the cheese like rubber. The tiramisu is not fresh. It's so frozen I can't even eat it yet. At least the 2-liter bottle of Diet Coke I got was good.

My husband was craving pizza so we decided to pick a place close to our hotel. We chose Albo's because of it's great reviews. We went to the restaurant and was empty but super clean. We had pizza and wings and both were great. Their garlic wings were extra crispy and had tons of flavor. The service was great and we will be back to try their pasta dishes. Prices were very reasonable and the portions were filling. It's off the strip on the way to downtown Vegas. Thank you for making our dinner yummy!

Albo's is a standard for lunch, dinner, and hangover food.  They have a carry out special: 14' one topping for like $7.50.  Amazing if you are super hungry and don't want to think about what to get. Also their lunch specials for around $7 are great... yummy chicken fingers!!!!!!!!!!! Sometimes when they deliver they get stuff wrong... i.e.toppings or extras... but since I live so close I just walk over there and check my stuff before I leave.  It's also nice to sit in the air conditioning watching the tv for a bit anyways. They are nice people, and if they do screw up on a delivery, they will come back and make it right. For a HANGOVER there is nothing better than taking one of their pizzas to bed with you. :)

We live close to Albo and would much rather have their pizza than the standard Dominos or Pizza Hut.

The pizzas are great and the wings are crispy and delicious.

The staff is wonderful and always greet us with a smile.

If you can, go in to order your pizza then walk next door and have a beer at Dino's....you won't regret it.

If you order delivery, 9 times out of 10 you'll get it early.

Pizza is good however I ordered ketchup and mustard only on a cheese burger well the 3 pounds of both made it more condiment than burger gross and uneatable also cheese sauce on the with the cheese fries I guess means put double do yourself a favor and stick with the pizza

Just moved into the neighborhood, and I'm trying to find more local places to eat at. I've seen Albo in the neighborhood before so I thought I would order delivery, It got here on time. We ordered a pizza wings and a drink(we got the drink for free for spending $25!) the pizza was pretty tasty, but the wings were kinda bad : / (sorry Albo). The hot sauce was so watery it didn't cling to the chicken at all leaving the chicken kind of tasteless,if you wanted hot wings you had to eat and drink the chicken and sauce together. The cause may be that they don't flower the wings for any crispyness. BUT I do like their pizza and that's what's most important at a pizza place. I will order again.

Best place to eat for the money, period. Tasha is awesome. Staff is professional, and the owner is one of the nicest guys you'd ever meet. I would seriously cry if this place ever closed. Philly, wings, fingers, pizza, and salads are fantastic!
Been coming here for months & excellent service, especially with delivery times less than 30 mins Great tasty, crunchy pizza

This place is wonderful! It's very casual so the younger crowd will enjoy the atmosphere while the older ones will enjoy the deals. I ordered the two 18in one topping pizza, one cheese and the other with bacon. This New York style pizza is amazing on its own and for $21.95 you just can't go wrong. I'm a picky eater when it comes to my pizza (specially my crust) however I couldn't find one complaint. The sauce is incredible and the bacon was cooked perfectly. Most reviews I've seen give it a 4/5 but I think it deserves a 5/5. From the huge menu selection from pizza to the pasta, salads and sandwiches. I'm also giving a 5/5 due to the fact that if you're simply wanting to stay in they offer delivery. I highly recommend this Italian restaurant to everyone. I promise you will not be disappointed. Love, Bug

This is one of my favorite Italian/Pizza places in the Arts District. The food is great! The fried mushroom are my favorite! Note: The food portions are large. The staff is friendly and chill and I definitely recommend it.

Went here after a long day in sun city waitresses was very nice as soon as I walked in. Pizza was very good and really cheap the wings are nice as well the restaurant has a good vibe about it thanks for the great pizza guys

Picked up lunch for me and my co worker. We ordered a pepperoni pizza garlic wings (well done)  and fries. Pizza was really good, not greasy or heavy at all. We ordered well done Garlic wings..... nah they were not what we expected at all. We called and asked to have the wings taken off the bill, the lady who answered advised we would need to bring the wings back... ok that's fine. We received a call back from Aszul sorry of spelling this incorrectly!! He stated he will take it off the tab and was sorry the wings were not what we expected gave is a nice suggestion to try the BBQ or hot next time. I was going to give 3stars cause the pizza was good but the wings were not to our liking and honestly was not going to really go here again. The excellent customer service is what has gained our business and we will def tell our other co workers and friends to try this place out when they are looking for yummy pizza downtown!

I got a bucket of Medium Chicken Fingers, and an order of Cheese Fries, sauce on the side, to go. It was a little overkill for just three people but I hadn't found a place that makes good old fashioned Chicken Fingers since Back East Pizza changed owners, about 20 years ago. LOL  Regardless, we each had about four fingers and some fries to hold over for snacks, and that is kind of a highlight in my book.
 They fry the fingers in a good batter til crunchy, then toss them with Mild, Medium, or Hot Sauce. I had to add my own celery sticks, so I took a star off. Honestly, what is this world coming to?
 The fries were crispy and the cheese sauce was average, not bad, just cheese sauce, you know?
 I'm not sure that I would be too comfortable eating here alone due to the area, and it's a little dark, not anything that would trouble me if I was with people but I would feel nervous at night alone. I'm getting chicken in my old age so don't let it stop you if you're young and full of invincibleness. 
 The rest of the menu looks good, and the service was very friendly. I wasn't offered the free bottle of soda it said I could get with me meal, but when I asked she said "Of course! Help yourself." Seems like a place you could get to know the staff and then hang out there a lot, eating and chilling.
 Parking is a little bit of an issue but there are signs pointing to where there was extra. They don't deliver to my address so I probably won't be ordering pizza unless I have a gathering, then I could hide the fingers until everyone left. I'm sneaky like that.
 Next time I'll try the Eclair for dessert and update the review.
 Now, to arm wrestle the Little Woman over whether we go here or that Barbque place that she and her brother love. (Or swing by here on the way to there and hide me some fingers for tomorrow. Shhhhh)

Albo pizza is rather reliable regarding takeout. Their toppings are quite nice but the average crust and an exorbitant amount of cheese is less so. Prices are fair but I would highly recommend ordering your pizza with a light amount of cheese, which would then be about as much as you would expect from most other pizzerias. My wife and I always feel very heavy and sometimes unwell after eating food from here and it has been a few times. I don't suspect I will continue doing so but you may want to give them a try for yourself as their deals are rather good.

We have been regular clients of Albo.  We just moved, and ordered delivery instead of pickup as we now live closer to the location.  The pizza we got through delivery was nothing like the ones we pick up.  One of the pizzas was normal, the other it seemed like they covered it in cream, not cheese.  We called to complain and they told us that we got what we ordered and too bad.  The woman on the phone was rude.  We won't order again.  Too bad, it was our weekly go-to.
Perfect pizza to devour while consuming alcohol! They deliver! You can pay by credit card over the phone! They have mozzeralla sticks! Can't wait to order more !

I got a REALLY bad case of food poisoning from this place. I ordered the baked ziti for lunch on Wednesday and it's now Friday night and I'm still having stomach cramps and going to the bathroom. Thursday was the worst day: fever, severe stomach cramps, nausea, chills, diarrhea, the whole nine yards. Needless to say, I will not be dining here ever again.

This place is incredible! Ordered it after a trade show (and being tired of walking around to find affordable food in Vegas) I have absolutely no complaints. The pizza was great and the delivery driver worked with me despite the hotel not wanting him to come in.

Good quality food. I usually just order the chicken wings with the fries. I order for delivery when I'm at work but things have changed. They don't deliver to the north premium outlets over the weekends, when they used to. I work a lot on weekends and it's a bummer that I can't get them to deliver to my store on weekends. But overall, good staff, prices and wings!

Of all the stand alone pizza places. This one is by far the most reasonably priced. Cheese isn't too greasy, crust is above par, and toppings as fresh as can be expected. Aside from that, the menus doesn't differ too much from most pizza places. Not much more you can say. It's pizza.

This is my go-to pizza delivery place. Delivery is fast and cheap, and the minimum order is low.

Their zucchini sticks, mushrooms, and onion rings are very good and the servings are generous. 

The calzones are large, ingredients are good. I actually prefer these over the pizza, but the pizza is very good as well. 

The sandwiches I've tried are decent, the macaroni salad is really good, and the eggplant parm is passable.

The fettuccine alfredo and their green salads are the only things I've tried that I wouldn't recommend. The alfredo sauce was on the bland side, and their green salads always seem to be a bit sad (maybe sat in the cooler too long?).

Overall, I highly recommend this place. For the prove point, I've been more than satisfied, and their customer service is excellent.

The cashier is a BITCH
The 18" inch sausage Special was thin and burnt, no cheese,all sauce.

Ordered from here as I didn't have very many options at the time. Food was not ready when I arrived and the place stunk of mildew so I chose to wait outside. When it was finally ready, they didn't even bother to let me know (there was only 1 table of people in the place so it wasn't due to being busy). Finally got the food back to the hotel, the eggplant parmigiana sandwich (not mine) was greasy & ok at best & my salad (no cheese - no dairy) had cheese in it & the dressing was creamy (thus unable to eat).
Best delivery place! They have cheap good food! Everything on the menu you would need for some delivery food and delivery charge is low. I really liked this place.

This is a jewel on an area of LV Blvd that is otherwise tattoo parlors and wedding chapels. I got some idea in my head to walk from Fremont Street back to the monorail to get back to my hotel near the Convention Center. It was a pretty lengthy walk but enjoyable and after my bar stop downtown I was getting hungry. I had passed this place on the walk up and decided to work in a stop on the way back if it was still open. It was, but just barely. The hostess who also became my server cheerfully showed me to a table and informed me of their dine-in special, which was competitive in pricing with Little Caesar's. The pie I ordered and received, however, was competitive in taste with some of the finest joints around, Grimaldi's included. She even left the TV remote at my table so I could surf while I waited for the food. When you get more food at better quality and great service when you're not expecting anything of that caliber (i.e. a single-digit dollar figure on the check!), it leaves a good taste in your mouth. These guys are late-night heroes.

Let me tell you, I am fond of their calimari!  

If I am absorbing the spiritual energies and might of the slain beast I am devouring, the noble squid is a wise choice indeed.  The lemon wedges on the side were good as I can rest assured that I have eluded scurvy for at least the time being due to their high vitamin C content.  Did someone say cocktail sauce???  Oh hell yeah!!!

My inner animal spirit is primarily Architeuthis dux (giant squid) or, sometimes, Mesonychoteuthis hamiltoni (colossal squid) but now it might be the particular binomial nomenclature of the Albo's calimari squid.

I like to drink Sprite with it!  =D

While driving up the strip with a hungry family we happened upon this place. It was a small hole in the ground place that had an A letter grade in the window.  The cashier greeted us promptly, seated us and explained the specials. We all enjoyed Pizza, Lasagna, spaghetti, salad, garlic bread, hot wings and soda for about $10 a person. It was a nice place to eat and easy on the wallet.
We were very pleased with the Pizza we ordered from Albo! It was delicious, wasn't greasy, and arrived quickly. Additionally the price was very reasonable as was the delivery fee.
Great pizza and customer service. Wish delivery was a little faster but understand it was a bisy night. Would eat here again.

**update**
I love their food so much!! Their white pizza with spinach and mushrooms is BOMB!!!!!! They are always early ... aiding my pizza addiction lol! 

They are always early for the delivery of delicious and properly seasoned pizza, pasta, or philly cheese steak sandwich. They have lots of coupons and charge minimally for delivery. Their prices are awesome too!!!

i will definitely not be going back to albo pizza.. i walked in with a powerade i set it on the counter top i ordered 20 wings for dine in. after she gave me my receipt she told me i could not drink my powerade if i dined in. i asked her why couldn't i drink my POWERade and she told me they had sodas for sale thats why. bad customer service i spent money on food. really bad customer service.  food is good wish i could give it more stars but screw that place

Ok so we were at Dino's bar and were a bit hungry deciding what we were going to do to fill our tummy's as we had not had dinner. We were drinking and needed something on our stomach as to prevent the psycho drunk after effect as well.

Albo's pizza is located behind Dino's bar and has a nice indoor seating option if you choose to dine in.

We opted to place an order for take out in which they actually walked it over and delivered to us at Dino's so we did not have to wait :) Yay!

We ordered a large Albo Special:
pepperoni, sausage, ground beef, ham, onions, mushrooms, black olives, green peppers 

Pizza was good, and plenty cheesy which is a bonus as they are a pizza shop that does not skimp on the cheese! That is something that drives me nuts when you have to add cheese as an extra topping just to get a decent amount, not here!

Pizza is good and the friendly personal service is even better :)

My next trip to Dino's we may just have to order another pizza from Albo's :)

They also had several pasta dishes that looked yummy as well! They have a wide and varied menu to choose from and not limited to pizza.

I love a good pizza. I love a good pizza even more when I'm in for a Saturday night, have already rented a movie On Demand, and I'm hungry.

Albo came up as an option to order delivery right through the Yelp app, so of course I was all about it. I scrolled through photos and reviews to decide on the Mr. Food Pizza and a Pepperoni & Pineapple Calzone. The calzone was a last minute addition in order to reach the order minimum of $12. *cough, cough * Okay, if I'm being honest, I met the order minimum with the pizza, but I really wanted to try one of their calzones.

The order process was simple since I have my card information linked to my account. If you don't already do this to take advantage of easy ordering and the Yelp CashBack program, stop reading right now, set it up, and come back to this review when you're done.

Our order came pretty quickly, I'd say about an hour, which is really great for online food delivery, and our delivery guy was really friendly. I would love anyone who showed up to my front door with pizza, but he was really nice. I opened the boxes to discover my Mr. Food Pizza was lukewarm, but they did take note of my request to only put onions on half. The pizza is covered in their marinara sauce and melted mozzarella, and also holds pepperoni, sausage, green peppers, and garlic. Overall it was okay, similar to a supreme pizza, but the crust was lacking flavor and was quite chewy.

The calzone was equally disappointing. The outer crust was burnt on the edges and what wasn't burnt was also chewy.  When I cut into it, it was super greasy. The amount of pepperoni and pineapple was quite small compared to the amount of cheese. It was stuffed, which is awesome, but the lack of toppings made it feel more like I was enjoying a very large serving of fried mozzarella. The marinara on the side was also pretty bland, so it really didn't add much to the experience.

I might order them again, but only after I give a few other pizza deliveries a try.
Really a great place! The pizza & the wings were awesome! The staff was nice. I will definitely be back.

Their pizza is delicious, but I visit twice a week for the cute girl working behind the counter.  
If you are vegetarian their spinach pizza is amazing!
